heading.name: Consider Heart Failure
heading.definition: Patients with heart failure dx in 2+ bills or 2+ visit encounters within last 3 years or LVEF < 40 OR BNP > 400 OR Current Digoxin OR Metolazone medication
heading.notes: Created for Doctors of BC i) HF dx in 2+ bills: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 84114007 OR starting with 428 AND with >= 2 Bills with the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 428 in the last 3 years" ii) HF dx in 2+ visits: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 84114007 OR starting with 428 AND with >= 2 Visit Encounters with Snomed diagnosis code 84114007 or the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 428 in the last 3 years" iii) LVEF < 40 OR BNP > 400 OR Current Digoxin OR Metolazone medication: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 84114007 OR starting with 428 AND ( has an LVEF (Left ventricular ejection fraction) observation and value < 40 OR a BNP observation and value > 400 OR Current Digoxin medication (ATC code C01AA05) OR Current Metolazone medication (ATC code C03BA08)"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "HF dx in ${numOfBills}+ bills", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "HF dx in ${numOfVisits}+ visits", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND ( fin.result1 < ${obs1Result} OR fin.result2 > ${obs2Result} OR fin.medcount >= ${numOfMeds})) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "LVEF < ${obs1Result} OR BNP > ${obs2Result} OR current Digoxin/Metolazone" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BILLING.billcount AS billcount, VISIT.visitcount AS visitcount, OBS1LAST.result AS result1, OBS2LAST.result AS result2, MEDS.numOfMeds AS medcount, dxr.dxresearch_code AS dx, dxr.coding_system AS dxs FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, count(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (dxresearch_code LIKE ${dxcodesICD} AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code = ${dxcodesSnoMed} AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 428 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no as demographic_no, b.dx_code1 as dxcode1, b.dx_code2 as dxcode2, b.dx_code3 as dxcode3, count(b.demographic_no) as billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE b.dx_code1 = ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code2 = ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code3 = ${billingCode} AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded 428 during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no as demographic_no, observation_date as visitdate, uuid, count(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) as visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no as demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id as id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type like ${dxcodesSysICD} and i.code like ${dxcodesICD}) OR (i.type like ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} and i.code = ${dxcodesSnoMed}) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- LVEF measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField as result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs1Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dataField NOT LIKE '>%' AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS1LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField as result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs2Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs2Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS2LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS2LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, count(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC IN ${drugs} AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, count(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (dxresearch_code LIKE ${dxcodesICD} AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code = ${dxcodesSnoMed} AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 428 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no as demographic_no, b.dx_code1 as dxcode1, b.dx_code2 as dxcode2, b.dx_code3 as dxcode3, count(b.demographic_no) as billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE b.dx_code1 = ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code2 = ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code3 = ${billingCode} AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded 428 during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no as demographic_no, observation_date as visitdate, uuid, count(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) as visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no as demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id as id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type like ${dxcodesSysICD} and i.code like ${dxcodesICD}) OR (i.type like ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} and i.code = ${dxcodesSnoMed}) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- LVEF measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField as result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs1Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dataField NOT LIKE '>%' AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS1LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField as result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs2Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs2Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS2LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS2LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, count(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC IN ${drugs} AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND dxr.dxresearch_code IS NULL AND ( (BILLING.billcount IS NOT NULL AND BILLING.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) OR (VISIT.visitcount IS NOT NULL AND VISIT.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) OR ((OBS1LAST.result IS NOT NULL AND OBS1LAST.result < ${obs1Result}) OR (OBS2LAST.result IS NOT NULL AND OBS2LAST.result > ${obs2Result}) OR (MEDS.numOfMeds IS NOT NULL AND MEDS.numOfMeds >= ${numOfMeds}) )) AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ORDER BY d.demographic_no
